Name: Central Athens
Description: The central area of Athens, encompassing the city s historic and administrative heart.

Name: North Athens
Description: The northern suburbs of Athens, known for residential areas and commercial centers.

Name: West Athens
Description: The western suburbs of Athens, characterized by industrial zones and residential neighborhoods.

Name: South Athens
Description: The southern suburbs of Athens, featuring coastal areas and modern developments.

Name: East Attica
Description: The eastern part of Attica, including coastal towns and rural landscapes.

Name: West Attica
Description: The western part of Attica, known for its industrial areas and natural parks.

Name: Piraeus
Description: The port city of Athens, serving as the main gateway to the Greek islands.

Name: Islands
Description: The islands of the Saronic Gulf, administratively part of the Attica region.
